#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

const int MAXN = (int) 1e5 + 10;
const int SQRT = (int) 300;
int n, m, ans[MAXN];
int cnt[SQRT + 10][MAXN];

int main() {
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
        freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);
    #endif

    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
    while (m--) {
        int a, b;
        scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
        if (a >= SQRT)
            for (int i = b; i <= n; i += a) ans[i]++;
        else cnt[a][b]++;
    }

    for (int a = 1; a <= SQRT; ++a)
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) {
            ans[i] += cnt[a][i];
            if (i + a <= n) cnt[a][i + a] += cnt[a][i];
        }

    for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) printf("%d ", ans[i]);
    return 0;
}
